籤詩版本二:
I-icing kwikhekhe inemibala ngakumbi, kwaye inhlanhla izisa amathamsanqa kunye namathamsanqa.
Abantu belo xesha akufuneki bazisole ngokuba baba nodumo kade ebomini kwaye baba nodumo kwihlabathi liphela ngomdlalo omnye.
詩意:
Le hexagram yi-icing kwikhekhe.
Ithamsanqa kuyo yonke into.
解曰: Endala iba yentsha. Ngenqanawa kwizinto ezigqityiweyo. Ngoko ubomi bakhe amabhongo. Yonke into ilishwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liang Haodengke
Umphengululi, uLiang Hao (963-1004), igama lembeko uTaisu, wazalelwa eXucheng, eYunzhou (ngoku eyiDongping, eShandong) kuNdlunkulu weNgoma.
Ngexesha lolawulo lukaYongxi, waphumelela uviwo lweJinshi eneminyaka elishumi elinesibhozo. Ukuqhubeka nokufaka isicelo soviwo aluphumelelanga.
Waqala ukubhala iimviwo kunyaka wesithathu weTianfu, wayeziphumelela iimviwo qho ngonyaka kuLawulo lwaKamva uHan kunye neLater Zhou Dynasty, kodwa wasilela minyaka le. Wafunga ukuba akayi kuphinda axolelane ukuba akaphumelelanga umvuzo wokuqala.
Kwiminyaka engamashumi asibhozo anesibini, kunyaka wesibini wolawulo lukaYongxi uMlawuli uZhenzong weNgoma yoBukhosi, waphumelela ibhaso lokuqala.
聖意: Thandazela ukhuseleko lwekhaya (olunqwenelekayo), ukhuseleko lobuqu, inzuzo yemali, intengiselwano, umtshato, iLiujia, abahambi ngeenyawo abangamadoda, iintshulube zesilika zaseChiti, amanqaku asibhozo, izilwanyana ezintandathu, ukukhangela abantu, amatyala kawonke-wonke, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekileyo, izifo zasemntla-ntshona, inzuzo enkulu yeFushan
